cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)
project(brainstemapp)
if(NOT ("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "GNU"))
    message(STATUS "brainstem project runs only on linux platform. Disabling: ${PROJECT_NAME}")
    return()
endif()
add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} main.cpp)
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES CXX_STANDARD 14)
find_library(BrainStem2 NAMES BrainStem2 libBrainStem2 PATHS ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include NO_DEFAULT_PATH)
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} SYSTEM PRIVATE PUBLIC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
message(STATUS " ${BrainStem2}")
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${BrainStem2})
